definition: supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: All grocery shopping bags contain at least one stick of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 所有超市購物袋裏都裝着至少一根法式長棍麪包。

sentences.english: Cartrider bicycle created by Korean designer Jaebeom Jeong.
sentences.chinese: 韓國設計師設計的由超市購物車改裝成的自行車。

sentences.english: Zhang Fang and Grandma are doing some shopping in thenearby supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 張芳和奶奶正在附近超市裏購物呢。

sentences.english: There was a notice in the supermarket.
It's four stops from here to Alander Supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 離阿蘭德超市還有四站路。

sentences.english: Auchan is present in China through its own brand Auchan hypermarkets and other retail brands.
sentences.chinese: 歐尚已通過歐尚超市和其他合作關係進入中國。

sentences.english: The building which stands near the train station is a supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 位於火趁魅站四周的那座年夜樓是一家超市。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhimei served as the general manager of the high champion supermarket, wasteful spending.
sentences.chinese: 蕭芝媚擔任高爾佳超市的總經理後，大手大腳花錢。

sentences.english: Material: China fir or pinewood. It was sold at WalMart in America before.
sentences.chinese: 杉木，松木製作，曾在美國沃爾瑪超市銷售。

sentences.english: You know that fruits and vegetables section?
sentences.chinese: 你知道超市的果蔬區嗎？

sentences.english: Supermarkets can afford to retail cigarettes at a couple of cents below the price charged by most tobacconists.
sentences.chinese: 超市能以比大多數煙商低幾便士的價格出售香菸。

sentences.english: The fee for the admittance of commodities to shopping malls is even higher than that for supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 相比較超市，百貨商場的進場費還要高。

sentences.english: E. g. The supermarket may be cheap but the corner shop is handier.
sentences.chinese: 超市可能很便宜，但街角的商店更近便。

sentences.english: Go straight ahead till you pass a supermarket, the bank is on your left side.
sentences.chinese: 你朝前走，經過一個超市，銀行就在你的左邊。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for Wis-Mpower to continue with its current strdinedgy of large- super centres.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾瑪的機緣存在於對現有大型超市戰略的對峙。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
